inclusion.criterion: Undergoing elective or urgent spinal surgery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Included are procedures aimed to decompress the spinal canal in the lumbar region due to a degenerative disease, i.e., laminectomy, discectomy and foraminotomies.
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has significant bilateral carotid stenosis and PVD, but no recent syncope or chest pain. He is undergoing evaluation for PVD.
